mea: ʻO kēlā me kēia mea e lawe i ka lewa a loaʻa ka nuipa
\u02bbele\u02bbele: ʻO ka mea maʻemaʻe i hana ʻia me hoʻokahi ʻano atom
\u02bb\u0101toma: ʻĀpana liʻiliʻi loa o ka mea hiki ke komo i loko o ka hopena kemika
p\u016bhui: Mea i hana ʻia me ʻelua a ʻoi aku paha nā mea i hoʻopaʻa ʻia me ke kemika
mole mole: Pūʻulu o nā ʻātoma i hoʻopaʻa kemika
huikau: ʻO ka hui ʻana o ʻelua a ʻoi aku paha nā mea ʻaʻole i hui pū ʻia me ke kemika
like like: Hoʻohui ʻia me ka haku mele like ʻole (e.g., solution)
like \u02bbole: Hui pū me ka haku like ʻole (e laʻa, hoʻokuʻu ʻia)
moku\u02bb\u0101ina: ʻO ke ʻano i loaʻa kahi mea (paʻa, wai, kinoea, plasma)
paa: ʻO ke kūlana o ka mea me ke ʻano a me ka leo paʻa
wai wai: Kūlana o ka mea me ka leo paʻa akā ʻaʻohe ʻano ʻano
kinoea: Kūlana o ka mea me ka ʻole o ke ʻano a i ʻole ka leo
pane \u02bbana: Ke kaʻina hana kahi e hoʻololi ai nā mea i mea hou
mea ho\u02bbopili: Ke hoʻololi nei ka mea i loko o ka hopena kemika
huahana: Hoʻokumu ʻia ka mea hou i loko o kahi hoʻoheheʻe kemika
pili: Hoʻoikaika i ka hoʻopaʻa ʻana i nā ʻātoma i loko o kahi mole a i ʻole ka hui
\u02bbano kimekini: ʻO ke ʻano pōkole o ka hōʻike ʻana i kahi mea me ka hoʻohana ʻana i nā hōʻailona a me nā helu
hoohalike kemika: Hōʻike hōʻailona o ka hopena kemika
ho\u02bbon\u0101: Homogeneous hui ʻana o kahi solute (mea hoʻoheheʻe) a me kahi solvent (mea hoʻoheheʻe)
ho\u02bbopa\u02bba \u02bbana: Ka nui o ka solute i hoʻoheheʻe ʻia i ka nui o ka solvent
\u02bbakika: He mea hāʻawi i nā ion hydrogen (H+) i ka wai
kumu: ʻO ka mea e ʻae i nā ion hydrogen (H+) i ka wai
ho\u02bbopa\u02bbapa\u02bba: Ka pane ʻana ma waena o ka ʻakika a me ka base, e hana ana i ka paʻakai a me ka wai
ikehu kemika: Hiki ke mālama ʻia ka ikehu i loko o nā paʻa kemika o kekahi mea
